name: SocialGram-me
desc: A social Media Image sharing application. Powered by Reactjs, Tailwindcss and React Querry for Frontend and Appwrite for Backend.

name: Pictures-me
desc: Pictures is a full-stack social media app, where you can share your pictures to everyone. It's built with React js and backend is powered by Sanity.io. So go and share your pictures.

name: Query-me
desc: Querry-Me is a search app built with React.js and the Wikipedia Search API. It allows users to enter a query and quickly fetch relevant results from Wikipedia in real time. Simple and efficient for accessing information.

name: Sumzer
desc: Simplify your reading with Summize, an open-source article summarizer that transforms lengthy articles into clear and concise summaries

name: WebDevTools

name: Appwrite Website
desc: Contributed to the open-source BaaS platform Appwrite, focusing on smaller yet impactful improvements such as bug fixes and feature enhancements.

name: RepoRater
desc: Contributed to repo-rater fixing bugs, improving UI, and adding features to enhance user experience and functionality. Addressed errors and refined the interface for a smoother, more intuitive interaction.
